Package simu.model

Class RestaurantServicePoint

java.lang.Object
simu.model.ServicePoint
simu.model.RestaurantServicePoint
public class RestaurantServicePoint extends ServicePoint
RestaurantServicePoint is a class that extends ServicePoint and represents a restaurant service point in the simulation. It differs from other service points in that it has a capacity for customers and a list of customers currently being served.

    • RestaurantServicePoint

      public RestaurantServicePoint(ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type, int rideCount, int capacity)
      Constructor for the RestaurantServicePoint class.
      Parameters:
      generator - The generator for the service point, used to generate service times.
      eventList - The event list for the simulation.
      type - The type of event.
      rideCount - The number of rides in the simulation.
      capacity - The capacity of the restaurant service point.

    • beginService

      public void beginService()
      The method to begin a new service at the restaurant service point. The method starts a new service and the customer is in the queue during the service. The method also sets the customer as in the restaurant and adds the customer to the customer list.
      Overrides:
      beginService in class ServicePoint
